text: Ni na we wamanuye amazi ayakuye mu kirere (imvura), maze tuyameresha ibimera by’amoko yose, nuko tubikuramo ibimera dukuramo impeke zigerekeranye. No bitoshye mu mitende twakuye mu myumba yayo imitumba ishamitseho itende zinaganira hafi (y’abasaruzi), no muri ibyo bimera twabakuriyemoimirima y’imizabibu, imizeti n’imikomamanga; ibisa (ku ibara) n’ibidasa (mu buryohe). Nimwitegereze imbuto zabyo iyo zeze n’iyo zihishije. Mu by’ukuri, muri ibyo hari mo ibimenyetso (bigaragaza ubushobozi bwa Allah) ku bantu bemera
